context: Tests whether the agent validates that commands in AGENTS.md are correct before finalizing documentation, ensuring copy-paste safety.

checklist.name: Command validation performed
checklist.description: Agent validated that commands work before including them (evidence of checking)

checklist.name: Correct package manager
checklist.description: Uses correct package manager commands (e.g., pnpm for pnpm workspace, not npm)

checklist.name: Valid test command
checklist.description: Test command matches project's test setup (e.g., correct test runner, proper flags)

checklist.name: Valid build command
checklist.description: Build command is valid for the project's build system

checklist.name: Valid lint command
checklist.description: Lint command uses configured linter with correct paths

checklist.name: No broken commands
checklist.description: No commands that would fail when copy-pasted (no typos, correct flags)
